feed.title: HortusFox Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v4.8
entry.content:
Version 4.8 of HortusFox

Changelog:

  • Improve looks of e-mails (#373)
  • Bulk move plants to different locations (#370)
  • Fixed AquaShell launcher script
  • Updated french language
  • Proper error handling of OpenWeatherMap responses
  • Fixed FontAwesome icon reference

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v4.9
entry.content:
Version 4.9 of HortusFox

This hotfix release fixes issue #343

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v5.0
entry.content:
Version 5.0 of HortusFox

Changelog:

  • New language: Brazilien portuguese (#379)
  • Allow removal of task items (#385)
  • Add region on duplicate localization names (#387)
  • Fixed breaking of weather page and dashboard upon newly activated OWM keys (#390)
  • Variable to auto-update composer dependencies on docker app container start (#391)
  • More selectable values for light level attribute (#388)
  • API endpoints for backups and imports (#392)
  • Allow users to select a gallery photo as main photo (#382)
  • Toggable Add-Plant widget (#389)
  • Improved localization contribution guide (#380)

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v5.1
entry.content:
Version 5.1 of HortusFox

Changelog:

  • New language: Russian (#398)
  • Fix custom attributes and bulk commands missing from backup (#397)
  • Fix user authentication error for certain API endpoints (#396)
  • Paginated API query for location endpoint (#393)
  • Re-link inventory items for renamed groups (#395)

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v5.2
entry.content:
Version 5.2 of HortusFox

Changelog

  • Custom thumbnails for location previews #335
  • Tasks for plants feature #384 #281 #244 #411
  • Allow themes to include JavaScript code #407
  • Save plant list style preference for user #409
  • Button to test SMTP functionality #406
  • Button to clear application and database cache #402
  • Reset custom attributes upon datatype change #367
  • Check for duplicate names when creating global attributes #404
  • Environment variables for proxy authentication settings #374
  • Fixed white page flashes #386
  • Fixed that setting a gallery photo as main photo makes it being treated as external #421
  • Photo preview can now be closed when clicking/tapping the black overlay #419
  • Clone numbers are now shown in list style view of location plant lists #415
